meanings.sent1: Her forgetting things easily is a failing of hers.
meanings.sent2: His inability to swim is a failing he hopes to overcome.
meanings.sent3: His failing to remember his own birthday led to a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The crack in the wall was a failing that weakened the entire structure.
meanings.sent5: The failing in the engine caused the car to break down suddenly.

meanings.sent1: His failing to score a goal disappointed the team.
meanings.sent2: The failing of the experiment taught them what not to do next time.
meanings.sent3: Her failing to bake a cake turned into a messy kitchen adventure.
meanings.sent4: The failing of the rocket launch left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent5: The failing of the plan was evident from the start.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming weaker or less successful
meanings.sent1: The failing of the company's profits worried the investors.
meanings.sent2: The failing of his health made him realize the importance of self-care.
meanings.sent3: The failing of the student's grades was a wake-up call for him.
meanings.sent4: The failing of the team's morale affected their performance on the field.
meanings.sent5: The failing of the bridge's support beams was a serious safety concern.
